mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveListContactInfo */ CONTACT_ID AS "contactId" , ADDRESS AS "address" , DISTRICT AS "district" , AMPHUR AS "amphur" , PROVINCE AS "province" , POSTAL_CODE AS "postalCode" , TELEPHONE AS "telephone" , FAX AS "fax" , CITY AS "city" , STATE AS "state" , COUNTRY AS "country" , CONTACT_PERSON AS "contactPerson" , EMAIL AS "email" , CREATED_BY AS "createdBy" , CREATED_DATE AS "createdDate" , UPDATED_BY AS "updatedBy" , UPDATED_DATE AS "updatedDate" FROM CONTACT_INFO ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTACT_INFO ( CONTACT_ID, ADDRESS, DISTRICT, AMPHUR, PROVINCE, POSTAL_CODE, TELEPHONE, FAX, CITY, STATE, COUNTRY, CONTACT_PERSON, EMAIL, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{contactID}, #{address}, #{district}, #{amphur}, #{province}, #{postalCode}, #{telephone}, #{fax}, #{city}, #{state}, #{country}, #{contactPerson}, #{email}, #{createdBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
